>

ICK ON EACH OTHER!"

stand on end.  She was beginning to get angry and true to her natural beast=
 mode, she displays her quills defensively.
> 

Dinobot, bemused by his agi=
tation of the Maximal, continued, "Oh?  YOu are the one who is threatening =
me with force and attempting to instigate a melee by arming your weapons.  =
I have taken no threat agaisnt you, and yet you are threatening to attack m=
e."  Grinning at LEO PRIME, "I thought you were teh one who brought us here=
 to negotiate a truce, and yet here you are with your soldiers threatening =
us with assault.  I suggest you work at keeping them behaved or send them e=
lsewhere, where htey might be less prone to end things prematurely if they =
are so dire you need our assistance."
